message.name: ERR_FININSTRUCTION_FV_AMOUNT_ZERO
message.locale: An invalid amount %1s was specified for reversal of the financial instruction. The amount must be greater than zero.

message.name: ERR_FININSTRUCTION_FV_FININSTRUCTIONSTATUS_REVERSED
message.locale: The underlying financial instruction is a reversal instruction and therefore cannot be reversed.

message.name: ERR_ILI_FV_AMOUNT_ZERO
message.locale: An invalid amount %1s was specified for reversal of the line item. The amount must be greater than zero.

message.name: ERR_ILI_FV_ILICATEGORY_NOTREVERSEABLE
message.locale: A line item within category "%1s" cannot be reversed at the component level, the full financial instruction must be reversed.

message.name: ERR_ILI_FV_ILICATEGORY_REVERSED
message.locale: The underlying line item is a reversal instruction and therefore cannot be reversed.

message.name: ERR_ILI_FV_ILICATEGORY_UNSUPPORTEDREVERSAL
message.locale: The line item category "%1s" is an unsupported category for reversal.

message.name: ERR_ILI_FV_ILITYPE_ALLOCREVERSALUNSUPPORTED
message.locale: Cannot reverse a repayment which has been fully allocated.

message.name: ERR_ILI_FV_ILITYPE_UNSUPPORTEDREVERSAL
message.locale: The line item type "%1s" is an unsupported type for reversal.

message.name: ERR_ILI_FV_INSTRUCTIONLINEITEMID_ZERO
message.locale: An invalid value (zero) was specified for the LineItemID.

message.name: ERR_ILI_FV_STATUS_REVERSED
message.locale: The status of the line item indicates that it is already reversed, so it cannot be reversed again.

message.name: INF_REVERSED_FINANCIAL_ITEM
message.locale: The %1s, or part of this financial instruction was reversed. This financial instruction is associated with the Case %2s of type %3s for %4s, please review this reversal to determine if anything requires your attention.

message.name: INF_REVERSED_FINANCIAL_ITEM_SUBJECT
message.locale: Reversal of financial instruction associated with Case %1s of type %2s for %3s
